output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF:11240017 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - explicitly mentions Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate, and directly calls for voting for him ("duminică, 24 noiembrie, votăm Marcel Ciolacu!")
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses collective language ("ne dorim", "pentru toți românii")
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Explicitly calls for votes ("votăm Marcel Ciolacu!") - Promotes the candidate's program and vision - Contrasts with "20 de ani de experimente nefaste" - Clear campaign messaging with hashtags like #CaleaSigură
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content - Contains partisan messaging and direct call to action for voting
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (PSD Dolj) - Contains formal campaign elements (CMF number, party hashtags)

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Direct call to vote for a specific candidate - Paid distribution on social media - Official party communication - Contains campaign messaging and slogans - Explicitly aims to influence voting behavior
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook (ID: 1334442494200293) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala. Materialul promoveaza explicit candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU si indeamna direct la vot ("duminică, 24 noiembrie, votăm Marcel Ciolacu!"), continand elemente specifice de propaganda electorala (CMF 11240017, hashtag-uri de campanie, mesaje electorale). Postarea este activa si promovata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind incetarea campaniei electorale.
